author: cblomart
body: Is there any way to connect to Office  365 via msolservice (connect-msolservice)?

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
Office 365 cmdlets don't yet support .NET/PowerShell Core. I recommend you submit a suggestion to the Office 365 Admin UserVoice: https://office365.uservoice.com/forums/273493-office-365-admin

Thanks!

title: MsOnline & Powershell Core
